# invalidate()

**Instance Method**

Invalidates the current card emulation session.

## Declaration

```swift
func invalidate()
```

## Discussion

This call stops any currently-running card emulation.

To restart, create a new [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/CardSession] instance with `startSession()`.
title: invalidate()
